description:
A special set in collaboration with the movie Top Gun: Maverick, featuring 6 aircraft (with originals), as well as nicknames and emblems.

TOP GUN: Maverick Aircraft Set includes:

• Playable Aircraft: F-14A Tomcat
A large carrier-based fighter that replaced the F-4 in handling fleet defense. Its striking twin engines and variable-sweep wings are iconic. Its nickname is Tomcat.
This aircraft can equip the LAAM, SAAM, or SFFS as its special weapon.
Includes 6 skins (with specials).

• Playable Aircraft: F-14A Tomcat | Top Gun: Maverick
A special aircraft based on the F-14A. Deadly at any range.
This aircraft can equip the LAAM, SAAM, or HPAA as its special weapon.
Features 8 skins from Top Gun, including Maverick and Iceman skins.

• Playable Aircraft: F/A-18E Super Hornet
The latest single-seat variant in the F/A-18 series. Like the F-type, its nickname is Super Hornet.
This aircraft can equip the HCAA, 4AGM, or LAGM as its special weapon.
Includes 6 skins (with specials).

• Playable Aircraft: F/A-18E Super Hornet | Top Gun: Maverick
A special aircraft based on the F/A-18E. Possesses well-balanced maneuverability.
This aircraft can equip the HCAA, HVAA, or GPB as its special weapon.
Includes 6 skins (with originals).

• Playable Aircraft: 5th Gen Fighter | Top Gun: Maverick
A 5th-generation fighter with superb versatility. It is highly maneuverable and can be fitted with a variety of parts.
This aircraft can equip the 4AAM, HCAA, or LACM as its special weapon.
Includes 6 skins (with originals).

• Playable Aircraft: DarkStar
A supersonic stealth fighter with extraordinary high-speed flight capabilities that set it apart from other aircraft.
This aircraft can equip the SASM, XSDB, or PLSL as its special weapon.
Includes 6 skins (with originals).

• Collaboration Emblems　
The VF-1 squadron emblem and the VFA-213 squadron emblem from the movie Top Gun.
The adversary PHOENIX: The phoenix emblem of F-14A Tomcat, an enemy aircraft in Top Gun: Maverick.
The 2 logos of the movie Top Gun: Maverick.
5 character emblems, including Maverick, Hangman, Payback, Rooster, and Bob.

• Collaboration Nicknames
12 nicknames, such as Goose and Cougar, exclusive to the TOP GUN: Maverick Aircraft Set.

• Multiplayer Mode BGMs
Top Gun Anthem (Keiki Kobayashi Arrangement)
Danger Zone (Keiki Kobayashi Arrangement)

*F-14A Tomcat | Top Gun: Maverick, F/A-18E Super Hornet | Top Gun: Maverick, 5th Gen Fighter | Top Gun: Maverick, and DarkStar are special aircraft that are part of a collaboration with the movie Top Gun: Maverick.

*Skins and emblems can be viewed by choosing Select a Skin, or Select Emblem respectively.
*Skins and emblems can only be changed in campaign mode after completing campaign mode once.
*In multiplayer mode, skins and emblems can be changed from the beginning.
name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - TOP GUN: Maverick Aircraft Set
